title: Peristerona Stadium
text: Peristerona Stadium is a multi-use <a href="stadium">stadium</a> in <a href="Peristerona">Peristerona</a>, <a href="Cyprus">Cyprus</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> matches and is the home ground of <a href="Doxa%20Katokopia">Doxa Katokopia</a> of the <a href="Cypriot%20First%20Division">Cypriot First Division</a>. The stadium holds 4,000 people.
